name: Fate of the World (itch) (jabd145.)
description:
This game was an entry for Mini-Jam 96

Fate of the World is a game that is all about losing to improve!

An Asteroid is about to crash into the Earth and you have to plant the bomb to blow it up and save the world! However, you have a high tech suit that will allow you to warp back in time right before you die. Therefore you have infinite attempts to cross this challenging level in the allotted time!

Controls:

  • 'W, A, S, D' = Move
  • 'SPACE' =Jump
  • 'LEFT CONTROL' + 'W, A, S, D'  = Rocket Boost
  • 'SPACE' + 'W, A' = Wall Jump
  • 'ESCAPE' = Return to Main Menu

3rd Party Assets Used:

2D Follow Path - Unity Asset Store

SimpleFX  Cartoon Particles - Unity Asset Store
